name: Judge Absurdia
description:
Welcome, new citizen, to Absurdia, the greatest country to ever be founded.

Absurdia is regarded as one of the safest countries in the world!

All this is thanks to our glorious leader, who decided every 10 seconds, someone must appear before court.

Are they guilty? Who knows! Do our leaders laws make sense? Absolutely!

It is up to our glorious judges to seperate fact from fiction.

For more information, as well as game hints, see the ludum dare page.
